title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make higher education more affordable, and for other purposes.
content: Make College Affordable Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an annual income-adjusted deduction for qualified higher education expenses paid on behalf of a taxpayer, spouse, dependent, or grandchild. Establishes an annual income-adjusted credit for the interest paid during the first 60 months of a qualified higher education loan by a non-dependent taxpayer.
